init.title: Tado X Options
init.description:
Configure your Tado X integration settings.

**API Quota:**
- Without Auto-Assist: 100 requests/day → updates every 45 min
- With Auto-Assist: 20,000 requests/day → updates every 30 sec

data_description.has_auto_assist: Enable this if you have an Auto-Assist subscription. This will automatically adjust the update interval.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the Tado API (in seconds). Minimum: 30s, Maximum: 3600s (1 hour). Without Auto-Assist, keep at 2700s (45 min) to stay under 100 requests/day.

set_temperature_offset.name: Set temperature offset
set_temperature_offset.description: Adjust the temperature offset for a Tado X device (valve or sensor) to calibrate temperature readings.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Tado X device to calibrate

offset.name: Temperature offset
offset.description: Temperature offset in °C. Positive values increase the reading, negative values decrease it.

add_meter_reading.description: Upload a meter reading to Tado Energy IQ

date.description: Date of reading (YYYY-MM-DD format, defaults to today)
